articles.description: Data released June 1 showed goods and services tax (GST) collections topped ₹1.4 lakh crore for the third month running in May, while the manufacturing purchasing managers' index (PMI) remained firmly in the growth zone at 54.6 in that month.
articles.content: India's economy is off to a strong start in the new financial year with several high-frequency indicators holding firm despite multiple headwinds, bouncing back from the tepid fourth quarter of FY22.… [+2686 chars]

articles.title: LIC confident about cleaning up bad debt investments: MD | Mint - Mint

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Air India offers cash incentive, reduces eligibility age to encourage staff to voluntarily retire - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Air India decreased the eligibility age from 55 to 40 and announced a monetary incentive on Wednesday, ostensibly to encourage a significant number of its staff to voluntarily retire.
articles.content: In an apparent bid to encourage a significant section of its employees to voluntarily retire, Air India on Wednesday reduced the eligibility age from 55 to 40 and announced cash incentive. The Tata G… [+1439 chars]

articles.title: Edtech startup Udayy shuts down, lays off entire staff - Economic Times
articles.description: Udayy raised around $10 million from US-based Norwest Venture Partners in February. It raised $2.5 million in seed funding a year ago. “We returned around $8-$8.5 million to the investors,  said cofounder Saumya Yadav.
articles.content:
Bengaluru: Edtech startup Udayy has fired 100-120 employees and shut down after its business slowed following the reopening of schools offline.
